subtitle: History
content: My humble beginnigs are dated into late 80s when I was boy who started to learn BASIC on Czechoslovakia micro-computer PMD 85. After Velvet Revolution my older brother bought us an amazing ZX-Spectrum Plus and my interest in a computers has grown so I learned assembly language of Zilog Z80 processor, so in the last years of elementary school I've programmed some beginner's experiments in assembler.
